Articles.Content:
Hey y'all

It meÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.everybody's favorite Redneck Christian.

I still don't have much of an interest in battles at this present time but I ll be back.

In the mean timeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦..how is everybody?

Any new tech I need to install into my ships?

You know what would be a terrible idea, more firepower.

http://i.imgur.com/EGdvQjC.png

But let's add some anyway. Nearly 300 parts worth of ordnance.

Wow I am drooling over this new ship. Also, I would like to play a few war games, off and on, as well.

Hey y'all

It meÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.everybody's favorite Redneck Christian.

I still don't have much of an interest in battles at this present time but I ll be back.

In the mean timeÃ¢â‚¬Â¦..how is everybody?

Any new tech I need to install into my ships?

I don't know, my newest, Victory, is triple layered with two layers of heavy armour and one layer of light armour inbetween.
I'll try to battle if anyone wants? Will just putting rockets on the side of my orbiter work?
You'll need some armour, I'll send you a download for the Fearless so you can reverse-engineer it.

Ok. land, sea or space?

Also replies may be erratic as I'm in India for a while.

Land. *evil grin*

Awesome to see you got this running again, astecarmyman. It's a nice breath of fresh air from the old thread, hope it will stay that way.

Good job killing the tank, I'll have to make the weapons and cockpit more durable next time. Do you happen to have a persist for me?

Oh dear... I forget the easiest thing.... DAMMIT....

Well I think it may be this: http://www.filedropper.com/persistent

If not, then I will have to redo my battle-phase, because after I did my turn I was testing all of your weapons vs my tanks.
I will rule the seas, no matter what it takes.
Are the forces rated by weight or cost?

Land. *evil grin*

Ok i'll whack together some land vehicles in a few secs. I'll say 25 tons Kerbin?

My first land battle so I'd rather start small and simple.

Ok i'll whack together some land vehicles in a few secs. I'll say 25 tons Kerbin?

My first land battle so I'd rather start small and simple.

Max vehicle count?

Max vehicle count?

Say 5 to keep it small. Are you allowed aircraft in land battles?

I've had to reverse engineer a Sherbert tank as I've never bothered with land vehicles before. Apart from that I've got all the needed craft.

I'll set up asap.

Edited August 12, 2014 by Comrade Jenkens

Say 5 to keep it small. Are you allowed aircraft in land battles?

I've had to reverse engineer a Sherbert tank as I've never bothered with land vehicles before. Apart from that I've got all the needed craft.

I'll set up asap.

I suppose you can use aircraft, but if you do, I GET EXTRA TONNAGE > (like if u use a 5ton aircraft, I get 5 more tons to use)

I also reverse engineered a Hater Flame Tank, heat weapons will be the future of warfare....

Guided missiles, you say... Tungsten dome! I think this'll be my frontline guided missile vehicle.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I suppose you can use aircraft, but if you do, I GET EXTRA TONNAGE > (like if u use a 5ton aircraft, I get 5 more tons to use)

I also reverse engineered a Hater Flame Tank, heat weapons will be the future of warfare....

Ok i'll just use 5 tanks. They're about 5 tons each.. I'm not sure what mode aircraft should be used in.

Ok i'll just use 5 tanks. They're about 5 tons each.. I'm not sure what mode aircraft should be used in.

I'd say just land them in the vicinity of the battle, (no more than 3km away from nearest enemy) so that they can still be destroyed. Aircraft would

still be affected by the move by weight rules.

Ok I'm set up. 5 Gaul Tanks, each is 4.7 tons for a total of 23.5. The Gaul tanks is a reverse engineered Sherbet and so is almost identical to Daemons tanks.

I know the location and vehicle selection isn't interesting but its my first land battle so I'd rather go easy.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/yjnhg3eb60jctr0/persistent.sfs Here is the persist.

Oh dear... I forget the easiest thing.... DAMMIT....

Well I think it may be this: http://www.filedropper.com/persistent

If not, then I will have to redo my battle-phase, because after I did my turn I was testing all of your weapons vs my tanks.

That perisitent has only your ships in it, none of mine are there.

That perisitent has only your ships in it, none of mine are there.

Well, F*** me. I will redo my battle post then.

Ok I'm set up. 5 Gaul Tanks, each is 4.7 tons for a total of 23.5. The Gaul tanks is a reverse engineered Sherbet and so is almost identical to Daemons tanks.

I know the location and vehicle selection isn't interesting but its my first land battle so I'd rather go easy.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/yjnhg3eb60jctr0/persistent.sfs Here is the persist.

http://i.imgur.com/4Fder99.png

!Battle Alert!

Forces:

2 Troller Flame Tank reverse engineered from the Hater Flame Tank with flame technology, heavy duty suspension,

and brand new composite reactive armor making it nearly impervious to kinetic weapons. 12 Tons of rugged steel

2 Pak36 Flak Guns (Dirt cheap, light, and effective)

(so light, I could have brought like 15 of these)

Battling:

There is a lot of recoil when firing the gun. Wish there was some way to dampen that.

The Gaul is decapitated.

http://www.filedropper.com/persistent_2

I see the value of those Flak guns! Despite being tiny they pack a good punch.

edit: can we fire multiple shots from the same vehicle?

I see the value of those Flak guns! Despite being tiny they pack a good punch.

edit: can we fire multiple shots from the same vehicle?

Yes silly You just can't fire at multiple vehicles within the same turn. (and you may only move one unit per turn)

These rules always apply unless a rule is specifically negotiated.

Awesome to see you got this running again, astecarmyman. It's a nice breath of fresh air from the old thread, hope it will stay that way.

Good job killing the tank, I'll have to make the weapons and cockpit more durable next time. Do you happen to have a persist for me?

Alright I redid my turn. (but with a few changes)

Instead of attacking the Heavy tank, I attack the light tank.

It is gutted. (command pod fell off)

I still attacked the Spade with my Wraith however.

I managed to knock off the engine compartment cover.

A nice hit on some MEATY insides!

I didn't take a clear pic, but I think I knocked off some of the I-beams from the Spade.

I've decided to not use all of my available ordinance.

(I have one missile left)

http://www.filedropper.com/persistent_3

Yes silly You just can't fire at multiple vehicles within the same turn. (and you may only move one unit per turn)

These rules always apply unless a rule is specifically negotiated.

Ok thanks. Very out of practice at this.

Also should I clean up debris, out of ammo vehicles, and destroyed vehicles on my next turn? Too late for this one.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/yjnhg3eb60jctr0/persistent.sfs

I see what you mean by recoil!

Flak gun destroyed! Small consolation for losing a tank though.

Edited August 12, 2014 by Comrade Jenkens

(and you may only move one unit per turn)

Better edit the OP then because it's always been otherwise.

Anyone up for a battle of any kind

Edited August 12, 2014 by Spartwo
